conbody.p: Every non-normal type item in Path of Exile has modifiers that provide various effects or improvements. These modifiers are known as affixes.
There are two types of affixes - prefixes and suffixes. All of the existing affixes in the game are separated between prefixes and suffixes and may belong to only one of these groups.
The maximum number of prefixes and suffixes an item can have is limited by its rarity.
